description: Redevelopment and rehabilitation to provide a three and four storey development comprising 7 no. three bedroom houses  2 no.three bedroom flats  10 no. two bedroom flats  33 no. one bedroom flats  190sq.m. of retail floorspace and 810sq.m. of office floorspace and new car parking and amenity areas. decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
